name: Shopulse
tag_list: flash-sales, e-commerce, ecommerce, retail, boutiques, discounts, deals, exclusivity, clothes, home
description: Exclusive sales from the best boutiques.
overview:
Shopulse is developing an e-commerce platform to help small retailers convert their overstock inventory into cash. With Shopulse, boutiques now have the bandwidth, agility and the infrastructure to compete and win against Big Box retailers.

For consumers, Shopulse provides a seamless way for them to buy from the world’s best boutiques at deep discounts. Products shown to customers are customized to their buying preferences creating a personalized shopping experience.
